name: Underworld Postal Service
description:
You are a newly recruited apprentice for the postal service of hell and have been tasked with sending a very important and urgent package to the devil himself! Only... apprentices are not allowed down there, they must start out aaaaaall the way up in the first layer of hell! Prove yourself as a proper postman of the underworld, rise through the ranks and descend through the depths of hell before it's too late! This package ain't gonna deliver itself...

For Ludum Dare 48, our first game jam!

WebGl version added post-jam
